mapper.select: select ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.`name` `name`, ur.url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId from ums_admin_role_relation ar LEFT JOIN ums_role r on ar.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_resource_relation rrr on rrr.role_id = r.id LEFT JOIN ums_resource ur on ur.id = rrr.resource_id WHERE ar.admin_id = #{adminId} AND ur.id is not null GROUP BY ur.id
